modName: A Beast Race Beautiful CBBE and TnT compatible Textures
summary: Beast Race Beautiful: High Quality, High Resolution Textures  \'NOT your average Texture changer\'
descriptionHtml:
Beast Race Beautiful is a high resolution Beast Race Texture pack created by me \'Watshisface\' for, 
Calientes female body mod http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666 
&
TnT Bodyshop. http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2941

I do not know if it is allowed for me to post a nexus link on here but i would assume it is ok.

TnT Bodyshop is a body mesh replacer created by my friends and i believe it is the first Body mesh to contain Nipples \'Projected from the body\' Credits go to them for creating the body meshes and inspiring me to get back into texture modding.
i reccomend 2pac4eva7BB_01 as the best body supporting textures marked with TnT supported
without TnT Bodyshop meshes, TnT supported textures will likely look irregular on a default body 


Ill explain this now so everyone knows the difference.
Beast Race := 
Argonian, Khajiit

Humanoid := 
Breton, Imperial, Nord, Redguard, 
Elves \'mer\' are considered humanoid
Altmer \'High Elves\' 
Bosmer \'Wood Elves\'
Dunmer \'Dark Elves\'
Orsimer \'Orc\'
and yes Orcs Are Elves.

\'complete texture sets\' head/hands/feet+body/tail files
----------------------Main Files-----------------------
LATEST NEWS!
Argonian Textures. BRAND NEW!! CBBEv3!!!  
Khajiit Textures.
are now compatible with Caliente Big Bottom Edition \'see -caliente compatible- in the file download section.  

Argonian Textures:-
new scale appearance, Entirely Reworked Tail + positioned higher \'MUST SEE\', seamless connections of limbs / barring head at times due to requirement of a reworked head mesh, free standing nipples

Khajiit Textures:-
new fur appearance, detailed face 

----------------Optional Files-----------------
Argonian Tale Mover -Universal-
This file heightens the argonian tail so it correctly appears from the tail-bone. All my argonian texture mods contain this file already so you do not need to download this aswell. this file can be used to raise the argonian tail even if they do not use the textures i created.

Khajiit Tail Mover -Universal-
This file heightens the khajiit tail so it correctly appears from the tail-bone. this file can be used to raise the Khajiit tail even if they do not use the textures i created.

hope you enjoy my textures everyone!
please bear in mind that all screenshots may not be up to date so expect better quality in game as i am constantly making changes to improve quality. :)

Permissions: You Do Not have permission to alter/re-post my textures or meshes used in these files, they are mine and you need to ask my permission to use them in your mod. I Will Rarely give permission for my files to be Altered so its best to not ask for that permission.

NOTICE TO USER COMMENTS: 
I DO NOT CARE IF YOU THINK ARGONIANS LOOK STRANGE WITH NIPPLES DONT LIKE IT? DONT COMMENT, DONT DOWNLOAD AND KINDLY LEAVE THIS PAGE

watshisface x
author: Watshisface
